Kennett School District
The mission of the Kennett Consolidated School District is to provide a quality education that increases the achievement of every student in order for all to become successful and thoughtful contributors to society.

"Bancroft Elementary School is dedicated to creating a safe and rewarding educational experience for all children. Our goal is to focus on student success by fostering a positive, accepting and supportive learning environment where students are proud of the work that they do each day."
- Principal Leah McComsey,

- Principal Lorenzo DeAngelis

- Principal Dr. Jeremy Hritz

Special Announcement, April 9, 2020
Per Governor Wolf's April 9th announcement, all Pennsylvania schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. As a result, new instruction for secondary students began Monday, March 30 and new instruction for elementary will begin on Tuesday, April 14. Visit the Coronavirus page posted on the District website for additional information.

Text size: A A A
Coronavirus
April 2020
Continuity of Education Plan
Food Distribution Plan(Updated 4/2)
Important Resources including Health-Related Services â including FAQâs
Independent Learning Resources
Clever, Schoology
Special Education
Technology Resources for Students
April 9, 2020
Dear Kennett Community,
I am writing in response to todayâs announcement from Governor Wolf that all Pennsylvania schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. While we feared this would be the ultimate outcome, it is sobering for the news to be official. We are grieving right along with you for the loss that this extended closure brings. To the teachers missing their classrooms and students, to the kids missing their beloved friends and routines, to the parents working double time to keep spirits bright, and to our seniors of whom we could not be any prouder â We are so very sorry.
While we are deeply disappointed by this reality, this official confirmation allows us to focus even more time and attention into our distance learning program. Please be reassured that our teachers and administrators are doing everything possible to ensure that our students continue to reach academic success and are ready to transition to the next grade level in the fall. We are working with the Pennsylvania Department of Education (PDE) and the School Board of Directors to make certain that seniors are able to graduate on time and have everything necessary for college admission. And lastly, we continue to work closely with the Chester County Health Department (CCHD) as we make plans for the gathering of personal items from schools, as well as when and how to hold a graduation ceremony as soon as it is deemed safe to do so.
We will continue to update you as we receive more information from PDE and CCHD and as we develop further plans regarding end-of-year activities, especially pertaining to graduation. Thank you for your continued support, patience, and positivity during this challenging season, and best wishes to you and your family for safety and good health.
Respectfully,
Dusty Blakey
Superintendent

Recursos TecnolÃ³gicos para Estudiantes
9 de Abril, 2020
Querida Comunidad de Kennett,
Les estoy escribiendo en respuesta al anuncio del Gobernador Wolf del dÃ­a de hoy, de que Todas las escuelas de Pensilvania permanecerÃ¡n cerradas por el resto del aÃ±o escolar 2019-2020. Aunque temÃ­a que este fuera el resultado final, es triste que las noticias sean oficiales. Lamento junto con ustedes, la pÃ©rdida que este cierre prolongado trae consigo. A los maestros, extraÃ±ando sus salones de clase y los estudiantes,a los niÃ±os/as, extraÃ±ando a sus queridos amigos(as) y las rutinas, a los padres, trabajando el doble de tiempo para mantener el espÃ­ritu alegre, y a nuestros âSeniorsâ(estudiantes de Grado 12), de los que no podrÃ­amos sentirnos mÃ¡s orgullosos â Lo siento mucho.
Aunque estamos profundamente decepcionados por esta realidad, esta confirmaciÃ³n oficial, nos permite concentrar aÃºn mÃ¡s nuestro tiempo y atenciÃ³n, a nuestro programa de aprendizaje a distancia. Por favor tengan la seguridad de que nuestros maestros y administradores estÃ¡n haciendo todo lo posible para asegurar que nuestros estudiantes continÃºen alcanzando el Ã©xito acadÃ©mico, y estÃ©n listos para la transiciÃ³n al siguiente nivel de grado,en el otoÃ±o. Estamos trabajando con el Departamento de EducaciÃ³n de Pensilvania (Pennsylvania Department of Education-PDE) y la Junta Directiva Escolar, para asegurarnos de que los âSeniorsâ(estudiantes de Grado 12) se gradÃºen a tiempo y tengan todo lo necesario para la admisiÃ³n en la universidad. Y por Ãºltimo, queremos continuar trabajando de cerca con el Departamento de Salud del Condado de Chester (Chester County Health Department-CCHD), mientras hacemos planes para recoger los objetos personales en las escuelas; asÃ­ tambiÃ©n en cuando y cÃ³mo llevar a cabo una ceremonia de graduaciÃ³n ,tan pronto como se considere seguro hacerlo.
Los continuaremos actualizando, conforme recibamos mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n del PDE(Departamento de EducaciÃ³n de Pensilvania-por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) y a medida que desarrollemos mÃ¡s planes, en relaciÃ³n a las actividades de fin de aÃ±o, especialmente en lo que respecta a la graduaciÃ³n. Gracias por su apoyo continuo, paciencia y positividad durante esta difÃ­cil temporada; y los mejores deseos de seguridad y buena salud , para usted y su familia.
Respetuosamente,
Dusty Blakey
Superintendente

function createCookie(name,value,days) { if (days) { var date = new Date(); date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000)); var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString(); } else { var expires = ""; } document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/"; }
function readCookie(name) { var nameEQ = name + "="; var ca = document.cookie.split(';'); for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) { var c = ca[i]; while (c.charAt(0)==' ') { c = c.substring(1,c.length); } if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) { return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length); } } return null; }
function eraseCookie(name) { createCookie(name,"",-1); }
function addExpandCollapse(id, expandSym, collapseSym, accordion) { jQuery('#' + id + ' span.expand').on('click.collapsingArchives', function() { if (accordion==1) { var theDiv = jQuery(this).parent().parent().find('span.collapse').parent().children('div'); jQuery(theDiv).hide('normal'); jQuery(this).parent().parent().find('span.collapse').removeClass('collapse').addClass('expand'); createCookie(theDiv.attr('id'), 0, 7); jQuery(this).parent().parent().find('span.sym').html(expandSym); //jQuery('#' + id + ' .expand .sym').html(expandSym); } expandArch(this, expandSym, collapseSym); return false; }); jQuery('#' + id + ' span.collapse').on('click.collapsingArchives', function() { collapseArch(this, expandSym, collapseSym); return false; }); }
function expandArch(symbol, expandSym, collapseSym) { var theDiv = jQuery(symbol).parent().children('div'); try { if (collapsItems[jQuery(theDiv).attr('id')]!='') { jQuery(theDiv).html(collapsItems[jQuery(theDiv).attr('id')]).show('normal'); } else { jQuery(theDiv).show('normal'); } } catch (err) { jQuery(theDiv).show('normal'); } jQuery(symbol).removeClass('expand').addClass('collapse'); jQuery(symbol).children('.sym').html(collapseSym); jQuery(symbol).off('click.collapsingArchives').on('click.collapsingArchives', function() { collapseArch(symbol, expandSym, collapseSym); return false; }); createCookie(theDiv.attr('id'), 1, 7); } function collapseArch(symbol, expandSym, collapseSym) { var theDiv = jQuery(symbol).parent().children('div'); jQuery(theDiv).hide('normal'); jQuery(symbol).removeClass('collapse').addClass('expand'); jQuery(symbol).children('.sym').html(expandSym); jQuery(symbol).off('click.collapsingArchives').on('click.collapsingArchives', function() { expandArch(symbol, expandSym, collapseSym); return false; }); createCookie(theDiv.attr('id'), 0, 7); } addExpandCollapse('widget-collapsarch-2-top','', '', 0)//
